caption: The photograph features a close-up of a sandy terrain with pronounced ripple patterns. A sizable, dark rock is centrally positioned, casting a pronounced shadow on the sand. Surrounding the rock is a pool of water which appears to be caught in the hollow formed by the rock's presence, reflecting sunlight and creating a slightly shiny surface. The water also creates a contrasting surface texture around the rock, distinguishing it from the dry, rippled sand. This image captures an intimate and detailed interaction between natural elements: rock, water, and sand, emphasizing textures and the interplay of light and shadow. The lighting, coupled with the angle of the shot, adds a compelling dramatic effect to the scene.
title: Tidal pools with reflected light
